items.title: Web Development
items.text: Building responsive, high-performance web apps with modern frameworks like React, Next.js, and Vue.js.

items.title: Mobile App Development
items.text: Creating cross-platform iOS and Android apps with React Native and Ionic focusing on performance, design, and usability.

items.title: Backend Development
items.text: Designing scalable and secure backend systems using Node.js, NestJS, Python, Django, C#, and ASP.NET.

items.title: Cloud Solutions & DevOps
items.text: Deploying and managing applications on AWS, GCP, and Azure with best practices in CI/CD, serverless, and cloud-native development.

items.title: AI/ML Integration
items.text: Building intelligent applications powered by machine learning models, automation, and data analytics.

items.title: Full-Stack Project Consulting
items.text: Helping startups and businesses plan, design, and build end-to-end digital solutions from concept to launch.
